member.name: T:FSharp.MongoDB.Bson.Serialization.FSharpValueSerializationProvider
member.summary: Provides (de)serialization of F# data types. Includes options, lists, maps, sets, records, and discriminated unions.

member.name: T:FSharp.MongoDB.Bson.Serialization.Conventions.DiscriminatedUnionConvention
member.summary: Convention for a discriminated union that maps the constructor and fields. Handles when the overall union type contains non-null union cases, or is a singleton union case.

member.name: T:FSharp.MongoDB.Bson.Serialization.Conventions.OptionTypeConvention
member.summary: Convention for option types that writes the value in the Some case and omits the field in the None case.

member.name: T:FSharp.MongoDB.Bson.Serialization.Conventions.RecordTypeConvention
member.summary: Convention for a record type that maps the constructor and fields.

member.name: M:FSharp.MongoDB.Bson.Serialization.ConventionsModule.Register
member.summary: Registers the conventions for F# data types.

member.name: T:FSharp.MongoDB.Bson.Serialization.ConventionsModule
member.summary: Entry point to initialize the F# data type conventions.

member.name: T:FSharp.MongoDB.Bson.Serialization.Serializers.DiscriminatedUnionSerializer
member.summary: A serializer for discriminated unions. Handles null union cases.

member.name: T:FSharp.MongoDB.Bson.Serialization.Serializers.OptionTypeSerializer
member.summary: A serializer for option types. Writes the value for the Some case, and null for the None case.
